CustomField.description: Deprecating as part of PSA 2.0 data clean-up effort; Field to remain visible (read-only) until all in-flight Projects with SARK Key are Completed/Closed. ETA July 2021. IT3087044. Melanie Kim. Created new SARK Key field to accommodate mapping of SARK Key field from related Opportunity to Project object through Process Builder (Opportunity SARK Key)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Deprecating as part of PSA 2.0 data clean-up effort; Field to remain visible (read-only) until all in-flight Projects with SARK Key are Completed/Closed. ETA July 2021.
CustomField.label: SARK Key
